sys_variable_value.value: state=rejected^u_journal_2=Απορρίφθηκε από εμπλεκόμενο υπεύθυνο ή υπεύθυνο τομέα QHS^flow_placeholder=false
flow placeholder = true και διαβιβαση προς διευθ QHS
Needs approval of CA/ADM and skip is false
Needs approval of LEG and skip is false
Needs approval of both CA/ADM and LEG and skip is false
No approval required from CA/ADM or LEG
Skip approve if commenting is true
flow placeholder is false and skip is false
if approved and LEM not needed
